nodes.text: there is virtually no chance a prison labor camp will be located in Siskiyou county to improve the badly neglected Klamath River
The camp is located either in Los Angeles or in Siskiyou
Siskiyou county apparently has been double crossed again by the state administration.
The prison camp would have been aimed at improving the river
The Board of Prison directors announced this week that a prison labor camp would be located in Palomar Park near Los Angeles to build a recreation center
If the camp is located in Los Angeles it won't be located in Siskiyou
